author: fwyzard
body:
Migrate HBHE reconstruction from `HcalHitReconstructor` to `HBHEPhase1Reconstructor`.  The HLT parameters for HBHE for Method 3 are a guess, based on the 2016 parameters.
    
Migrate HF reconstruction from `HcalHitReconstructor` to `HFPreReconstructor` + `HFPhase1Reconstructor`. The HLT parameters for HF are identical to those used by RECO, despite the differences that were present in 2016.
title: HLT customisations for the Phase I HCAL upgrades
